Title: SGraphicer
Description: SGraphicer is a library, which allows the programmer to take control of the rendering process of each of the different stereo-frames, when using the NVIDIA 3D Vision kit. This library is implemented with C\# and DirectX, but it can be easily ported to other platforms.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SGraphicer is a library, which allows the programmer to take control of the rendering process of each of the different stereo-frames, when using the NVIDIA 3D Vision kit. This library is implemented with C\# and DirectX, but it can be easily ported to other platforms.
